00032 #include "OFEvaluator.hpp"
00033 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00034 #include "ObjectiveFunction.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00037 
00038 
00039 OFEvaluator::OFEvaluator( ObjectiveFunction* of ) : OF(of), doBCD(false)
00040   { }
00041 
00042 
00043 bool OFEvaluator::initialize( Mesh* mesh, 
00044                               MeshDomain* domain,
00045                               const Settings* settings,
00046                               PatchSet* user_set,
00047                               MsqError& err )
00048 {
00049   if (doBCD) {
00050     tempType = ObjectiveFunction::TEMPORARY;
00051     firstType = ObjectiveFunction::SAVE;
00052     updateType = ObjectiveFunction::UPDATE;
00053   }
00054   else {
00055     tempType = firstType = updateType = ObjectiveFunction::CALCULATE;
00056   }
00057   reset();
00058 
00059   if (!doBCD) // Nash
00060     return true;
00061   
00062   if (!have_objective_function()) {
00063     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot perform block coordinate descent algorithm"
00064                     " without an ObjectiveFunction", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00065     return false;
00066   }
00067   
00068   bool result = get_objective_function()->
00069     initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh, domain, settings, user_set, err );
00070   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void OFEvaluator::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
00074                                     MeshDomain* domain,
00075                                     const Settings* settings,
00076                                     MsqError& err )
00077 {
00078   if (get_objective_function())
00079     get_objective_function()->initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err );
00080   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool OFEvaluator::reset() 
00084 {
00085   currUpdateType = firstType;
00086   return true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, MsqError& err )
00090 {
00091   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00092     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00093   bool b = get_objective_function()
00094     ->evaluate( currUpdateType, pd, value, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00095   currUpdateType = updateType;
00096   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, 
00101                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00102                           MsqError& err )
00103 {
00104   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00105     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00106   bool b = get_objective_function()
00107     ->evaluate_with_gradient( currUpdateType, pd, value, grad, err );
00108   currUpdateType = updateType;
00109   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00110 }

00113 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, 
00114                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00115                           std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag,
00116                           MsqError& err )
00117 {
00118   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00119     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00120   bool b = get_objective_function()
00121     ->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( currUpdateType, pd, value, grad, hess_diag, err );
00122   currUpdateType = updateType;
00123   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00124 }

00141 bool OFEvaluator::evaluate( PatchData& pd, double& value, MsqError& err ) const
00142 { 
00143   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00144     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00145   bool b = get_objective_function()->evaluate( tempType, pd, value, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err ); 
00146   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00147 }

00156   bool b = get_objective_function()
00157     ->evaluate_with_gradient( tempType, pd, value, grad, err );
